abstract: China National Chemical Corporation unit will make takeover bid for Italian tire maker Pirelli after agreeing to buy stake of Camfin, Pirelli's biggest shareholder.
lead_paragraph: The China National Chemical Corporation unit will buy a 26.2 percent stake held by Camfin, Pirelli’s largest shareholder, and make a takeover bid for the Italian tire maker.

headline.main: China National Chemical Unit Nears Deal for Tire Maker Pirelli
headline.print_headline: China Tire Firm to Bid on Pirelli

snippet: The China National Chemical Corporation unit will buy a 26.2 percent stake held by Camfin, Pirelli’s largest shareholder, and make a takeover bid for the Italian tire maker.
